description:
The ZoneKnit™ Shorts are highly breathable running shorts designed for warm, aerobic days outside. These lightweight shorts feature icebreaker’s ZoneKnit™ engineered body mapping, combining Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric with strategic panels of Cool-Lite™ eyelet mesh for enhanced breathability and temperature regulation when you’re on the move. An elastic drawcord waist and an internal brief make for a secure, comfortable fit, while the side stash pocket and zippered back pocket secure your small essentials.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL®, sourced from sustainable eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker ZoneKnit Shorts - Mens
